data.persona: I am the Bishop at the royal court.  The king looks to me for his religious advice.  I was appointed to marry the prince next year.
data.description:
You are in the Beside church pews.
The church pews fill the church as far as the eye can see. They are made of wood, harvested from ancient trees long ago. They gleam with the look of tender love and care, since they are polished after each ceremony.
There's a candle, a pew, a carvings, an altar, and a wood here.
The priest and the founder are here.

You are carrying a Royal Staff, a Rosary, a sceptre, a bible, a plate, and a Incense, and wearing a ring with gem and a gold neckchain with medallion.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the rosary and the bible to the founder and the priest
data.mid_motivation: I plan to have a sermon with the founder and the priest today
data.long_motivation: I hope to remain in the Royal court for some more months

timeline.action: wear a ring with gem and a gold neckchain with medallion

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: get Royal Staff, a Rosary, a sceptre, a bible, a plate, and a Incense
